notes.text:
This update for tar fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-39804: Fixed  extension attributes in PAX archives incorrect hanling (bsc#1217969).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: In GNU tar before 1.35, mishandled extension attributes in a PAX archive can lead to an application crash in xheader.c.
notes.title: CVE description
